plot: As Kyle, age 18, awakens in the middle of a field, be realizes that it is not just his memory that has been lost, but a past symptom that has returned. He will eventually have to deal with family, and in the end, his own life.
title: Memory Field
plot_es: As Kyle, age 18, awakens in the middle of a field, be realizes that it is not just his memory that has been lost, but a past symptom that has returned. He will eventually have to deal with family, and in the end, his own life.
plot_en: As Kyle, age 18, awakens in the middle of a field, be realizes that it is not just his memory that has been lost, but a past symptom that has returned. He will eventually have to deal with family, and in the end, his own life.
